## sl1cmd

sl1cmd is a command line interface to interact with ScienceLogic Monitoring tool API.

### Synopsis

sl1cmd is a command line interface to interact with ScienceLogic Monitoring tool API.

### Options

```
  -h, --help       display this help and exit
      --insecure   accept invalid certificates.
  -v, --version    output version information and exit
```
